page.title: 20Childrens Leisure Hollington
page.content: Many children go to{organised clubs (cubs, brownies, girls and boys brigade, football); and have extra lessons (dancing, skating,swimming). Some of these are in our area, some in the centre of Hastings. We thought about other leisure time. The most popular{indoor activity}was watching{television.}Many children watched at least 3 hours an evening, and had portable T.V. sets in their bedrooms. Lots of children liked to draw or play games (snooker, cards, board games). Some preferred reading. {Outdoor games}were different in summer and winter. Many children, over two thirds, have bikes and ride around the area a lot. They also liked playing football and roller skating. Some mentioned playing around the estate and play parks.Less than half had a summer holiday away from Hastings.
